text: Booking service was prompt,  responsive and professional. Easy transaction with clear instructions. Drivers assigned were on time, Vans were clean, spacious, and most importantly, my whole family felt safe when chauffeured to our destination.

I have used this service multiple times and for something as important as my husbandâ€™s 40th. It was the best thing I could have done as the entire process was smooth and professionally managed. The team went beyond my expectations and joined in to make sure the celebrations went as per planned. I would highly recommend the party bus and the company simply because they manage it all for you and let you focus on the important part which is creating memories. FYI - I have had 3 other friends book this service after our party.
Polite and helpful drivers who are always punctual, in fact all earlier than stated time, at the pickup point. Most important point is safe driving observed to the destination.

Booking was quick and efficient despite only contacting them the day before.

Drivers assigned were friendly and drove safe.
Driver is very punctual and helpful. Have been with them for years and still like their service. Will continue to engage them.
